personal.name: Dendy Sapto Adi
personal.title: Fullstack Developer
personal.subtitle: We don't build sites, we build profits.
personal.summary: With over 7 years of experience, I specialize in frameworks like NextJS, Angular, and React. I am passionate about web and mobile design and thrive on improving my skills and solving complex problems. As a strong communicator, I work effectively with clients and team members, and my fluency in English ensures clear and effective communication.
personal.about:
I'm a Freelance IT Consultant and Senior Frontend Engineer with over 7 years of experience helping companies build scalable, high-performing digital systems. I focus on turning complex technical challenges into solutions that drive real business growth.

My work spans SaaS platforms, CRM automation, and data-driven web applications built with modern architecture, speed, and scalability in mind. I value structured code, clear communication, and collaborative teamwork to deliver products that perform consistently and profitably.

I believe technology should do more than look good, it should create measurable impact. I'm open to working with global clients who need someone who can think strategically, lead confidently, and get things done.

experience.title: Product Engineer
experience.description: Developed and launched a new user-generated content (UGC) page with a load time of less than 200 ms, improving the user experience and SEO performance through schema optimization and CDN-based asset delivery. Optimized performance of legacy front-end code through targeted CSS and layout improvements, leading to faster rendering, reduced blocking time, and improved overall Core Web Vitals. Implemented advanced SEO strategies and managed Google Search Console with schema markup, internal linking, and Cloudinary image optimization to increase organic visibility and keyword ranking. Designed scalable and modular web applications for Emma, the AI recruitment platform, using Vue.js, Nuxt, and SolidJS to support microfrontend integration and enterprise-grade performance. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to debug, troubleshoot, and optimize backend APIs, ensuring high-quality deliverables, consistent code standards, and production stability across environments.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer (SFE)
experience.description: Led the frontend development of the Chatbot AI, culminating in the successful deployment of version 2.0 to production. Enhanced functionality and security, resulting in a 90% reduction in operational costs and a 10x increase in speed through updates, new features, and bug fixes. Developed advanced features such as push notifications, PDF/XLSX report downloads, and interactive elements using Intro.js and Rappid.js for a canvas editor. Achieved 100% test coverage using Karma-Angular testing, ensuring robust and reliable code with AI Plus integrated with Telkom LLM, expanding its functionality and quality.

clients.name: Dashboard Monitoring
clients.description: Developed 8 dashboard and advanced features such as Chart.JS, PDF/XLSX report downloads. Achieved ±95% test coverage using Karma-Angular testing, ensuring robust and reliable code.
